channel.title: [PI] Skill Requirements [PI] Rep++
channel.description: Hey everyone. Was playing my server as a skiller, and was thinking of ways i could promote skilling. So, I've Decided to create a skilling Area, with the Requirements of 99 Firemaking, Woodcutting, and Farming, that could be accessed by an object. I've been browsing through my client class, and couldnt find anything that had to do with a requirement of such. and have come here for help. Would anyone mind sharing that with me? Thanks :)

item.title: [PI] Skill Requirements [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Loveandpower:

tip: download hybrid pvp v3 and see how the portal to the 99 hunter/agility area is made. Very same concept.

Oi, That never came across my mind. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Skill Requirements [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey everyone.
Was playing my server as a skiller, and was thinking of ways i could promote skilling. So, I’ve Decided to create a skilling Area, with the Requirements of 99 Firemaking, Woodcutting, and Farming, that could be accessed by an object. I’ve been browsing through my client class, and couldnt find anything that had to do with a requirement of such. and have come here for help.
Would anyone mind sharing that with me?
Thanks
